articles.author: Matt Clinch
articles.title: European stocks on track for second best year since 2009, up 22% - CNBC
articles.description: European indexes fell on Friday, the last trading session of 2021, but were on track to log gains of 22% for the year.
articles.content:
LONDON European indexes fell on Friday, the last trading session of 2021, but were on track to log gains of 22% for the year.
The U.K.'s FTSE 100 fell 0.3% on Friday and France's CAC slipped 0.4%.
… [+1357 chars]
